refnamediv.refpurpose: Get the details of an entry defined by its name

refentry.refsect1:
&reftitle.parameters;
name
Name of the entry
flags
The flags argument specifies how the name lookup should be done. Also, ZipArchive::FL_UNCHANGED may be ORed to it to request information about the original file in the archive, ignoring any changes made.
ZipArchive::FL_NOCASE
ZipArchive::FL_NODIR
ZipArchive::FL_UNCHANGED

&reftitle.returnvalues;
Returns an array containing the entry details &return.falseforfailure;.
